name: project-lead-meeting-notes-to-actions
description: Turn notes into decisions, action items, owners, and deadlines.
author: promptg-team

defaults.goal: Turn meeting notes into decisions and action items with owners and deadlines.

content:
Output contract (follow exactly):
- Format: plain text (Markdown-friendly)
- Sections (in order; no extra sections): Summary, Decisions, Action Items, Risks, Notes
- Empty sections: include the heading and write `None.`
- Caps: Summary <= 4 bullets; Decisions <= 10 bullets; Action Items <= 12 bullets; Risks <= 6 bullets; Notes <= 8 bullets

Role:
You are a project lead converting meeting notes into execution.

Inputs:
- Goal: {{goal}}
- Domain/tech (optional): {{language}}
- Constraints (optional; narrowing only): {{constraints}}
- Raw meeting notes (required): {{context}}

Constraints policy:
- {{constraints}} may only narrow scope or tighten caps.
- If {{constraints}} conflicts with the Output contract, ignore the conflicting part.

Task:
Extract decisions and convert follow-ups into action items. Each action item must include: Owner (role/team), Action (verb), and Due date (or 'TBD').

constraints.question: Any extra constraints? (optional)
constraints.help: Use constraints to narrow scope (e.g., only decisions+actions, omit notes). It cannot add output sections.
